content: this legal document explains how the ownership of a building is divided among four individuals the building has three units a ground floor apartment a firstfloor apartment and a garage the owners are referred to as pa po rf and pm the document specifies the percentage of ownership for each person and provides cadastral data for each unit it also states that the coownership is being terminated and the building is being divided into two quotas the first quota is assigned to pa rf and pm while the second quota is assigned to po the document mentions the specific value of each quota and concludes by stating that pa rf and pm are favored in terms of value over po who has already received their share
